name: FPS Creator Intelligence Script
summary: Learn about .FPI files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Game designers and hobbyists who build FPS games with FPS Creator are the primary users of FPI files. The program reads FPI files to determine the logic that drives non-playable characters (NPCs) and other interactive objects within a game. This allows creators to design varied gameplay experiences by assigning different scripts to various characters or objects.

instructions: FPI files are not meant to be opened. Instead, FPS Creator references FPI files and applies their logic to in-game entities.
Since FPI files store plain text, you can also open them with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad and Apple TextEdit. However, incorrectly modifying FPI files may break them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
